Today's your lucky day, soldier. It so happens that my master, the sorcerer Oshar, is launching a new venture.

Under his guidance, I've developed a hair lotion that rejuvenates and volumizes hair, and even regrows it. I need to produce another test batch, but I'm out of ingredients.

But that's lucky for you!"It is?"

Indeed! You can help me create this miracle lotion!

Catch a few azureroot ghilliedhus and check them for beehives.

Gather the honey and reap the awesome rewards!

I won't forget this, .

In fact, I'm going to add your name under "Contributors" on the recipe. And here is a small token of my gratitude.

The completion of Leshoff's Luxurious Lotion is near.

Once I get enough ghilliedhu tree honey, it's complete!
